label: combined immunodeficiency syndrome
definition: A combined immunodeficiency in which other clinical features are present in other organ systems in addition to immunodeficiency.

label: FASLG-related immunodeficiency
definition: An immunodeficiency disease in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the FASLG gene.

label: TNFRSF9-related immunodeficiency
definition: An immunodeficiency disease in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the TNFRSF9 gene.

label: DNAJC21-related Shwachman Diamond syndrome
definition: A Shwachman Diamond syndrome in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the DNAJC21 gene.

label: IRF4-related immune disorder
definition: An immune disorder in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the interferon activation domain of the IRF4 gene.

label: PTEN harmartoma tumor syndrome with immune disorder
TREX1-related autosomal dominant Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome
definition: Autosomal dominant form of Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome 1.

label: argyrophilic grain disease
definition: A tauopathy characterized pathologically by the presence of silver stain positive lesions called argyrophilic grains, oligodendrocytic coiled bodies, and neuronal tau-positive pretangles.

label: interstitial lung disease 2
definition: An interstitial lung disease in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the SFTPA2 gene.

label: idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis
definition: An interstitial lung disease with a poor prognosis, that is characterized by the progressive formation of scar tissue within the lungs in the absence of any known cause.

label: IRF4-related combined immunodeficiency
definition: A combined immunodeficiency in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the IRF4 gene.

label: NFATC1-related combined immunodeficiency
definition: A combined immunodeficiency in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the NFATC1 gene.

label: POLD2-related combined immunodeficiency
definition: A non-severe combined immunodeficiency due to polymerase delta deficiency in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the POLD2 gene.

label: POLD3-related combined immunodeficiency
definition: A combined immunodeficiency in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the POLD3 gene.

label: IKZF2-related combined immunodeficiency
definition: A combined immunodeficiency syndrome in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the IKZF2 gene.

label: CHD7-related CHARGE syndrome
definition: A CHARGE syndrome in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the CHD7 gene.

label: ACO2-related optic atrophy with or without extraocular features
definition: An optic atrophy in which the cause of the disease is monoallelic or biallelic variants in the ACO2 gene. ACO2 is a mitochondrial protein and thus, in addition to the optic atrophy features, features of this disease include abnormal mitochondrial morphology and can affect other organ systems. Extraocular features can include ataxia, spastic paraplegia, CNS abnormalities, neurodevelopmental phenotypes, and retinal degeneration.

label: complex movement disorder with or without neurodevelopmental features
definition: A movement disorder characterized by having one or more different types of movement disorders, such as abnormal muscle tone, abnormal degree of movement, dystonia or torsion, which may occur with or without neurodevelopmental features, such as developmental delay or intellectual disability.

label: inherited distal renal tubular acidosis
definition: A form of distal renal tubular acidosis that is inherited.

label: acquired distal renal tubular acidosis
definition: A form of distal renal tular acidosis that develops secondary to another condition, usually disease or drug.

label: ELANE-related neutropenia
definition: Any neutropenia in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the ELANE gene.

label: giant cell hepatitis with autoimmune hemolytic anemia
definition: A rare autoimmune disease of early childhood, marked by the simultaneous or sequential immune attack on red blood cells and liver cells.

label: HAVCR2-related cancer predisposition
definition: Hereditary cancer predisposition due to variation(s) in the HAVCR2 gene, which confers the predisposition to susceptibility to subcutaneous panniculitis-like T-cell lymphoma (SPTCL) and hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH). Affected individuals typically present with multiple subcutaneous nodules and systemic B symptoms.

label: diffuse midline glioma, H3 K27-altered
definition: A diffuse midline glioma characterized by H3 K27 alteration and usually either a histone H3 K27M mutation, an EGFR mutation, or aberrant overexpression of EZHIP. The prognosis is poor.

label: FLNB-associated autosomal dominant filamin related bone disorder
definition: Any autosomal dominant filamin related bone disorder in which the cause of the disease is a variation in FLNB gene.

label: systemic lupus erythematosus related to C1QA
definition: Any systemic lupus erythematosus in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the C1QA gene.

label: systemic lupus erythematosus related to C1S
definition: Any systemic lupus erythematosus in which the cause of the disease is a variation in the C1S gene.
